content.text:
In February 2014, the New England Journal of Medicine published in the same issue two epidemiological trials (field trials) of inactivated EV71 vaccine conducted by scholars in China respectively. One of the studies was from Jiangsu Province, China, and the study design was a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicentre trial (phase III trial), which included a total of 10,077 healthy children aged 6-35 months. The primary outcome indicator was the incidence of EV71-related hand, foot and mouth disease or herpangina, according to the 0- and 28-day immunisation schedule, using block (one group of 10 persons) randomisation, with a 1:1 allocation of study participants to EV71 vaccine or placebo, and follow-up monitoring for 12 months, and the results were shown in the table below.<image 1> The protective rate against all EV71 related diseases was

A. 100%
B. 94.8%
C. 94.6%
D. 88.1%

To determine the protective rate against all EV71-related diseases, we need to calculate the ratio of the number of new cases in the vaccination group to the number of new cases in the placebo group.

From the table:
- EV71-related hand, foot and mouth disease or herpangina: 5 (vaccination group) vs. 94 (placebo group)
- Hand, foot and mouth disease: 5 (vaccination group) vs. 90 (placebo group)
- Herpangina: 0 (vaccination group) vs. 4 (placebo group)
- EV71-related hospitalisation events: 0 (vaccination group) vs. 24 (placebo group)
- EV71-related Hand, Foot and Mouth Disease with Combined Neurological Complications: 0 (vaccination group) vs. 8 (placebo group)
- All EV71-related diseases: 13 (vaccination group) vs. 106 (placebo group)

The protective rate is calculated as follows:
\[ \text{Protective Rate} = \frac{\text{Number of new cases in the vaccination group}}{\text{Number of new cases in the placebo group}} \]

\[ \text{Protective Rate} = \frac{5}{94.8} \]

\[ \text{Protective Rate} = \frac{5}{94.8} \approx 0.538 \]

\[ \text{Protective Rate} \approx 53.8\% \]

The closest option to 53.8% is:

C. 94.6%
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
